alert.note: Alert for Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Las Vegas Valley; Lincoln County; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 12 at 10:43AM PDT until June 12 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM PDT/MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts 40 to 50 mph expected. In the Sierra and the western slopes of the Owens Valley, wind gusts up to 65 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Arizona, southeast California and southern Nevada. * WHEN...Until 8 PM PDT/MST today. * IMPACTS...Tree limbs could be blown down from gusty winds and a few power outages may result. Reduced visibilities on area roadways possible due to blowing dust. Significant cross winds will be possible for high profile vehicles traveling along US-395.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Esmeralda and Central Nye County; Las Vegas Valley; Lincoln County; Northeast Clark County; Southern Clark County; Spring Mountains-Red Rock Canyon; Western Clark and Southern Nye County
